Grain.Do: Barley (1 katori cooked), Quinoa (1 katori cooked), Amaranth (1 katori cooked), Oats (1 katori cooked). Prioritize whole grains and avoid refined ones.
Grain.Dont: White rice, refined flour products (maida), refined semolina (suji) in large quantities. Limit processed cereals.

Legume.Do: Moong dal (1 katori cooked), Masoor dal (1 katori cooked), Chana dal (1 katori cooked). Ensure they are well-cooked and easy to digest. Include sprouted versions in moderation.
Legume.Dont: Large quantities of rajma, chole, urad dal (especially whole). Avoid deep-fried dals.

Veg.Do: Cooked carrots (1 katori), sweet potato (1 small), bottle gourd (1 katori), zucchini (1 katori), ash gourd (1 katori). Steamed or lightly sautéed vegetables are best.
Veg.Dont: Raw, cruciferous vegetables like broccoli, cabbage, cauliflower in excess. Fried vegetables. Bitter gourd (karela) in large amounts for Vata dominance.

Spices.Do: Cumin, coriander, turmeric, ginger (fresh), cardamom, cinnamon, fennel. These aid digestion and balance Vata and Pitta.
Spices.Dont: Excessive chili, black pepper, mustard seeds. Avoid overly pungent spices in large amounts.

Leafy veg.Do: Cooked spinach (1 katori), methi (fenugreek leaves) (1 katori), purslane (1 katori). Lightly sautéed or steamed.
Leafy veg.Dont: Raw leafy greens in large quantities. Bitter leafy vegetables in excess.

Oil.Do: Ghee (1-2 tsp per meal), sesame oil (cold-pressed) (1-2 tsp per meal), olive oil (extra virgin) (1-2 tsp per meal). Use sparingly for cooking.
Oil.Dont: Refined oils, hydrogenated oils, excess of any oil. Avoid deep frying.

Fruits.Do: Sweet fruits like ripe mango (1 small), banana (1 small), papaya (1 katori), pears (1 small), berries (1 katori).
Fruits.Dont: Sour fruits like oranges, lemons, grapefruit in excess. Very dry fruits like dried figs in large quantities. Unripe fruits.

Nuts and Dry fruits.Do: Almonds (soaked, 4-6 pcs), walnuts (2-3 pcs). Consume in moderation and soaked if possible.
Nuts and Dry fruits.Dont: Cashews, peanuts in large quantities. Roasted and salted nuts. Excessive dates and raisins.

Milk product.Do: Warm milk (1 katori before bed, if tolerated), yogurt (1/2 katori, diluted or with spices like cumin), paneer (low fat, 50g).
Milk product.Dont: Cold milk, sour yogurt, hard cheeses, ice cream. Avoid with sour fruits.

Condiments.Do: Fresh ginger chutney (small amount), mint chutney (small amount), mild tamarind chutney (small amount).
Condiments.Dont: Spicy pickles, excessive vinegar-based condiments, processed ketchup.
